case.state: Is this The Inventory? It seems like my articles on it are a bit outdated. Time for a dive into the source!
Telltale's The Inventory seems to have changed a bit... Which means that I need to update my articles! Time for a first-person dive into the source!
Oh, so the article on The Inventory wasn't vandalized. It is a strip poker club now! Those articles need to be updated, and I am here for it!
I'm used to playing poker at the sea, but never strip poker! This will be exciting!
The sound of waves is so relaxing. I'm sure this will make for a better, more pleasant game...

{small}Batman is a superhero who appears in American comic books published by DC Comics. Batman was created by artist Bob Kane and writer Bill Finger, and debuted in the 27th issue of the comic book Detective Comics on March 30, 1939. In the DC Universe continuity, Batman is the alias of Bruce Wayne, a wealthy American playboy, philanthropist, and owner of Wayne Enterprises based in Gotham City. Kane, Finger, and future DC writers accompanied Batman with supporting characters, including his sidekick Robin, allies Alfred Pennyworth and James Gordon, and foes such as Catwoman, the Scarecrow, the Penguin, and his archenemy, the Joker. Since his first appearance in 1939, Batman has been adapted into various media such as film, radio, television, and video games, as well as numerous merchandising items. The Batman franchise has become one of the highest-grossing media franchises of all time.{!reset}

{small}Cowboy Bebop is a Japanese science fiction anime television series animated by Sunrise featuring a production team led by director Shinichirō Watanabe, screenwriter Keiko Nobumoto, character designer Toshihiro Kawamoto, mechanical designer Kimitoshi Yamane, and composer Yoko Kanno. The twenty-six episodes, also called "sessions," of the series are set in the year 2071, and follow the lives of a bounty hunter crew traveling in their spaceship called the Bebop.{!reset}

{small}Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) video game developed and published by Valve. The game is a sequel to Defense of the Ancients (DotA), which was a community-created mod for Blizzard Entertainment's Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos and its expansion pack, The Frozen Throne. Dota 2 is played in matches between two teams of five players, with each team occupying and defending their own separate base on the map. Each of the ten players independently controls a powerful character, known as a "hero", who all have unique abilities and differing styles of play. During a match players collect experience points and items for their heroes to successfully defeat the opposing team's heroes in player versus player combat. A team wins by being the first to destroy the other team's "Ancient", a large structure located within their base.{!reset}

{small}Fate/Apocrypha is a Japanese light novel series in Type-Moon's Fate franchise, written by Yūichirō Higashide and illustrated by Ototsugu Konoe. Type-Moon published five volumes from December 2012 to December 2014.{!reset}
Although I lack sources on this, I sense vandals and criminals in this table. I will try to enjoy myself, but I will not lower my guard!
Hello, everyone! My name is Wikipe-tan, and I came here to have a good time, as well as to study this place!
Greetings, everyone! You can call me Wikipe-tan. I came here to write an article on this place, as well as to experience it's fun on my own!
According to poker statistics, I should swap these cards.

I am going to swap cards.
But I will not tell you which ones. That would spoil the fun!
In poker, the probability of each type of 5-card hand can be computed by calculating the proportion of hands of that type among all possible hands.
The development of poker probability theory in the late 1400s was attributed to gambling; when playing a game with high stakes, players wanted to know what the chance of winning would be.
Did you know that the probability of a royal flush is 0.000154% ?

Here's a fun fact:
The probability of drawing a straight flush is 0.00139%
Should I...? No, not according to that article...
All the pieces are falling into place.
It looks like all those hours at article speedrunning are paying off!
I have read every article on poker there is, and even spell-checked some of them. Do you really think I will be an easy opponent to beat?
Are you just learning how to play poker? Is this why we're playing Cantrell draw? I am up for the challenge if anyone wants to player a more complicated variant.
I hope you were expecting someone else to strip. If you were looking to see more of me, you are up for disappointment.

{small}"Poker Face" is a song by American singer Lady Gaga from her debut studio album, The Fame (2008). It was released on September 26, 2008, as the album's second single. "Poker Face" is a synth-pop song in the key of G♯ minor, following in the footsteps of her previous single "Just Dance", but with a darker musical tone. The main idea behind the song is bisexuality and was a tribute by Gaga to her rock and roll boyfriends. The song's lyrics feature various sexual innuendos.{!reset}

{small}A poker face, also known as a blank expression, is a facial expression characterized by neutral positioning of the facial features, implying a lack of strong emotion. Not to be confused with Lady Gaga's song "Poker Face."{!reset}

Five-card draw, which is also known as a Cantrell draw, is a poker variant that is considered the simplest variant of poker, and is the basis for video poker. As a result, it is often the first variant learned by new players.
I do not enjoy to be called a Captain Obvious, by the way. Just making it clear.
It is always advisable to go for a safer hand, like a pair or two pair. However, if you suspect that your opponents have similar hands as well, you might be safer going for riskier plays.
{small}A poker face may be caused by a lack of emotion, depression, boredom or slight confusion, such as when someone refers to something which the listener does not understand.{!reset}

{small}A deliberately-induced blank expression meant to conceal one's emotions is what people refer as a poker face, referring to the common practice of maintaining one's composure when playing the card game poker.{!reset}
As much as I love writing articles, I have to admit that Wikipedia is not a reliable source. Do not use it for your college or workplace projects, please.

... {small}Cock and ball torture (CBT), penis torture or dick torture is a sexual activity involving application of pain or constriction to the penis or testicles. This may involve directly painful activities, such as genital piercing, wax play, genital spanking, squeezing, ball-busting, genital flogging, urethral play, tickle torture, erotic electrostimulation, kneeing or kicking. The recipient of such activities may receive direct physical pleasure via masochism, or emotional pleasure through erotic humiliation, or knowledge that the play is pleasing to a sadistic dominant. Many of these practices carry significant health risks. {!reset}
Someone vandalized this hand...
I need to re-read articles on poker strategies...
I should have spent more time reading about poker strategies instead of cleaning up articles about popular media...

Did you know that the probability of drawing a four of a kind is 0.0240%?
Such a random, fun fact, right?

Here is a fun fact! The probability of drawing a full house is 0.1441% .
Which is actually higher than drawing a four of a kind!
A vampire is a creature from folklore that subsists by feeding on the vital essence (generally in the form of blood) of the living. Everything else changes depending on the culture and it's folklore.

{small}In law, an alien is any person (including an organization) who is not a citizen or a national of a specific country, although definitions and terminology differ to some degree depending upon the continent or region of Earth. More generally, however, the term "alien" is perceived as synonymous with foreign national.{!reset}

A catgirl is a female kemonomimi character with cat traits, such as cat ears, a cat tail, or other feline characteristics on an otherwise human body. They are found in various fiction genres and in particular Japanese anime and manga.

Air (desambiguation). Air is part of the Earth atmosphere that humans breathe. It's made up of 78% Nitrogen, 21% Oxygen, and 1% other (including water, vapor). Air may also refer to: Music - Air (music), French for aria, various song-like vocal or instrument compositions. Air on the G-string, the most notable and famous version of these s
What do you mean that Henry Cavill is not dead? Do you have a source for that ? I need to fix that article as soon as possible!
(I accidentally brought the old piece of the japanese Wikipedia logo... I hope nobody notices that my ウ is missing a line...)
I suppose I had to lose at some point.
Well... It is a game of chance after all. Not all rounds can be won.
Good plays, everyone. Allow me to recompense your efforts.
I should commend you on your skills. But since this poker variant is mostly based on chance, that statement would require more accurate sources.

I believe this is one of the reasons people prefer this poker variant. The increased importance of luck makes all rounds unpredictable, while every layer lost makes every round spicier than the one before...
This line is not supposed to play. If you see it, please report it.
This line is not supposed to play. If you see it, please report it.
This line is not supposed to play. If you can read it, please report it.
It is customary to start with your shoes or other accessories in games like these. Unless you want to surprise your opponents.
Most strip poker players start by stripping something decent and/or superfluous. In this case, I will start with my shoes.

An apron is a garment that is worn over other clothing and covers mainly the front of the body. The word comes from old French napron meaning a small piece of cloth, however over time "a napron" became "an apron".
An apron is mostly known as a functional accessory that protects one's clothes and skin from stains and marks.
Various types of aprons may also be worn as a decoration, for hygienic reasons, as part of a uniform, or as protection from certain dangers such as acid, allergens or excessive heat.
If you were hoping for traditional bra and panties, you might be in for a surprise...
I might be as open and easy to read as a book, but even I hold some surprises...
Well, there go the stockings then. I hope you enjoyed watching me using them!
I was under the impression that wearing the stockings with the swimsuit would work as a way to accentuate the fanservice aspect of the outfit. But if you desire me to strip out of it, I will...
Do not expect me to take it all at once. Every other girl wears bras and panties, it would only be fair for me to have two chances!
I consulted with the administration early on, and they were okay with me stripping the swimsuit in two turns. I hope you are not disappointed!
W-well... There it goes then. You will see all of me like I was an open article for everyone to read...
I can not believe it has come to this... But oh well...
As the game goes on I might lose again, and I will strip more and more clothes until there is nothing left.
This might have been an easy strip, but future ones will not be as uninteresting as this one.
Next up comes my apron. Do you think you will get me to take it off?
Aprons can be used in work stations to hold extra tools and pieces or protecting from dust and unwanted products. I will get mine back as soon as I beat you!
I am going to miss this apron. My cosplay maid outfit feels incomplete without it. But if I win, I can get it back.
As the representative for the WikiProject for Anime and Manga, I have to be prepared to multitask. Such as representing cosplay culture and swimsuit fanservice as well!

It might seem to be counterintuitive to wear a swimsuit under a dress, but as the representative for both the fanservice article and the WikiProject for Anime and Manga, I have to be ready to multitask!
Now only my swimsuit remains. Will you be able to take me out of it?
I like this swimsuit. I hope you like it too, since it is going to be a while until you get me to strip out of it.
There is nothing wrong with my breasts, is there? The way you are looking at them is... Oh, I get it. You are aroused! This is great!
At least you will get to watch my breasts for a while. But I will try harder to win now! So do not expect to see more!
Just like a well-written article. Organized, neat, and perfectly trimmed!
This is it then. All of me. I hope you are not disappointed...
Responsible hygiene is crucial for a healthy sex life. A trimmed crotch is a good balance between tidiness and naturality.
I am as dilligent with my body hygiene as I am with my articles! I try to keep a good shape and a neat, trimmed crotch. And I am proud of it!
A tie? Now this is certainly unexpected! These are very rare!
I wonder what the probability for ties are... I need to re-study the article on poker statistics...
Is that it?
Am I playing the game right? I would not take my headpieces one at a time, or my stockings one at a time either...
Is everything okay, ~target~? You seem to be stalling by removing something like that. You are not afraid, are you?
To think I could be stalling like ~target~ by removing all of my clothing one at a time... But would not that defeat the purpose of strip poker?
That was not particularly hard for you to remove, was it?
And nothing of value was lost. We can continue with the game.
Maybe you will play better once you start losing actual clothing.
Some strip poker joint consider accessories as cheating, you know?
Here is a fun fact for you: Stalling with accessories is often seen as bad manners in certain strip poker joints, since they defeat the purpose of the game.
Are you afraid of removing real clothing, ~name~?
If you need suggestions for what to remove next, I would love to share mine.

Is it normal for the women of this culture to feel embarrassed of showing off their own bodies?
What even is the culture of this place...? Or is it more like a melting pot?
Take your time,~name~. The more time we spend together, the more time I have to study you and your playing patterns.
I hope to see more of you in the future.
Please, let us know if you are not willing to strip nude. That would save everyone a lot more time.
You do not have to strip clothing if that makes you uncomfortable. But I advise you to not sign up for strip poker games in the future if that is the case.
That article was merely a stub. I hope you help improving the mood of the game by expanding the repertoire of articles you are willing to strip.
I look forward to seeing more of you, ~target~.
The more clothing you remove, the more I know about you! And knowledge is always exciting.
Go on, ~target~. I want to see more of you. All of you, if possible.
I better remember this. I do not want to forget about your ~clothing~ when I write the article on this place.
This is like a reverse jigsaw puzzle. The more pieces of you I see you take off, the more I learn about your true form.
We are very close to removing the important pieces now. This will get exciting.
I had a suspicion you were going to take your ~clothing~ off. But I had no sources backing it, so I decided to not say it.
You have our full attention, ~target~.
By removing your clothes in a sexually suggestive or seductive manner, you have technically become what is usually called a "stripper." So, while you are at it, why not enjoy it?
It is customary to strip one's clothes in practiced or unrehearsed dance moves if the aim is to titillate the audience.
An ecdysiast (pronounced ek - dee- siast) is a humorous yet accurate way to refer to what's commonly known as a stripper, if you do not want to be referred as such.
It is hard to believe that I actually came to a strip poker joint... And that there is a man in front of me strippin right now...
Nothing that I have not seen before in an article. But I am glad that you managed to strip out of it!
Go, ~name~! Show off more of you!
This does not have to be embarrassing for you. Many cultures have zero taboos on nudity!
You can prolong the undressing with delaying tactics such as putting your recently removed clothes or hands in front of the undressed body parts.
If your aim is to arouse the ones watching the strip, you might invite them to remove your clothing themselves. ~player~ here seems quite eager to do so.
That was very brave of you, ~name~!
Both females and males develop breasts from the same embryological tissues. So, even if you refuse to realize it, yours and mine are very similar.

{small}Certain male deities representing regeneration and fertility were occasionally depicted with breast-like appendices, such as the river god Hapy who was considered to be responsible for the annual overflowing of the Nile.{!reset}
I have seen many pictures of these before in many articles... Animal penises, human penises, all kinds... So why am I so nervous? Haha...

I have seen pictures of penises many times during my editing sessions... N-not because I wanted to! It is not my fault that the articles on sexual organs are so popular that people constantly edit them wrong!
Surgical penis enlargement methods can be effective; however, such methods carry risks of complications and are not medically indicated except in cases involving a micropenis.
Limited scientific evidence supports the idea that you can achieve some penis elongation by prolonged traction.
It's just the primary sexual organ that male animals use to inseminate females (or hermaphrodites) during copulation... No need to feel so nervous around it...

{small}The human penis is an external male intromittent organ that additionally serves as the urinal duct. The main parts are the root (radix); the body (corpus); and the epithelium of the penis including the shaft skin and the foreskin (prepuce) covering the glans penis.{!reset}

{small}A systematic review of 15,521 men (and the best research to date on the topic, as the subjects were measured by health professionals) in 2015 concluded that the average length of an erect human penis is 13.12 cm (5.17 inches) long. So... It is fair to say that you are above average.{!reset}
I have studied the female mammary glands for a while now... N-not that I care that much about the topic! It is just a very popular article!

Many people theorize that the act of stripping and the anticipation at the sight of breasts produces more exciement than the sight itself. I have no sources on this, but I would love for you to contribute.
Your breast may be underdeveloped, but your aureolas and nipples seem to be perfectly functional!

{small}According to "Breast Size Perception and Satisfaction, Body Image, and Psychological Functioning in Caucasian and Asian American College Women" by Elissa Koff & Amy Benavage, Many women regard their breasts as important to their sexual attractiveness, as a sign of femininity that is important to their sense of self. A woman with smaller breasts may regard her breasts as less attractive, but she should not have to!{!reset}

Mammary intercourse is mostly suited for women with naturally larger breasts, while it is recommended that woman with smaller breasts be on top.
Smaller female breasts, however, tend to be more sensitive than larger ones.

It has been said that breast implants are not flexible enough to sustain mammary intercourse.{small}[citation needed]{!reset}
So you should feel proud of your natural breasts!

{small}Scientists hypothesize that non-paraphilic sexual attraction to breasts is the result of their function as a secondary sex characteristic. The breasts play roles in both sexual pleasure and reproduction. Men typically find female breasts attractive and this holds true for a variety of cultures.{!reset}

{small}Zoologist and ethologist Desmond Morris theorizes that cleavage is a sexual signal that imitates the image of the cleft between the buttocks, which according to Morris in The Naked Ape is also unique to humans, other primates as a rule having much flatter buttocks.{!reset}

{small}Evolutionary psychologists theorize that humans' permanently enlarged breasts, in contrast to other primates' breasts, which only enlarge during ovulation, allows human females to "solicit [human] male attention and investment even when they are not really fertile."{!reset}
Sexual attraction to breasts is considered normal unless it is exclusive and is therefore a form of partialism.
There is a widespread fascination with women's breasts, and especially their size. Many people, both male and female, consider breasts an important female secondary sex characteristic.

{small}The basic components of a mature mammary gland are the alveoli (hollow cavities, a few millimeters large) lined with milk-secreting cuboidal cells and surrounded by myoepithelial cells. These alveoli join to form groups known as lobules. Each lobule has a lactiferous duct that drains into openings in the nipple.{!reset}

{small}In European pre-historic societies, sculptures of female figures with pronounced or highly exaggerated breasts were common. A typical example is the so-called Venus of Willendorf, one of many Paleolithic Venus figurines with ample hips and bosom. Artifacts such as bowls, rock carvings and sacred statues with breasts have been recorded from 15,000 BC up to late antiquity all across Europe, North Africa and the Middle East.{!reset}

{small}Many female deities representing love and fertility were associated with breasts and breast milk. Figures of the Phoenician goddess Astarte were represented as pillars studded with breasts. Isis, an Egyptian goddess who represented, among many other things, ideal motherhood, was often portrayed as suckling pharaohs, thereby confirming their divine status as rulers.{!reset}

{small}In Ancient Greece there were several cults worshipping the "Kourotrophos", the suckling mother, represented by goddesses such as Gaia, Hera and Artemis. The worship of deities symbolized by the female breast in Greece became less common during the first millennium. The popular adoration of female goddesses decreased significantly during the rise of the Greek city states, a legacy which was passed on to the later Roman Empire.{!reset}t}
Articles on sexual organs are very popular, so I have seen many of these during my spell-checking editing sessions.

So... that is how yours look like. Do not worry, ~name~. I will not tell anyone!
{small}(... But I might incude it in the article){!reset}
I will treasure this information forever, ~name~. And I am sure the internet will do so too.

state.text: I am going to assume that you are not actually Nikkimaria and are just hoping to get a reaction out of me. However, I refuse to call you that, so I will just call you Prankster.

case.state: I have to admit that I am a bit biased towards watching catfolk strip, since I have posed as a catgirl myself for the article on catgirls...
Do not feel bad for losing. Poker is mostly a game of chance, where the real skill is measuring that chance.
I hope you did not lose on purpose to show off. Did you, ~name~?
It is ~name~'s turn!
Getting to see more of your body is always good. I will treasure and remember this new information.
What will it be, ~target~?
I will take some notes on this!
If ~name~ lost, then it is a fact that ~name.ifMale(he|she)~ is the one to strip now.
My apologies, ~name~, but as you can see, I can not afford to lose more rounds if I want to play along with the taboos that make this gmae interesting.
Show off for us, ~name~. This will be educational.
You never had a chance against me, ~target~. Now, you know what to do.
Oh, do not worry. I am taking mental notes as we speak. I am sure I will remember all of this...
I have to watch very closely. It is for science, you know.
We truly are primates after all. Look at your technique...
I wonder if this is relevant information that I should add to the article... I better take some notes just in case...
Oh my... This is certainly very... educational...
Are you going to give us your "donation" soon, ~name~?
Enjoying the view, ~name~? Do not worry. You are not the first to masturbate to my "fanservice."
Was that pleasurable, ~name~? It certainly looked that way.
In a scale from 1 to 10, how would you classify your satisfaction, ~name~?
Thank you for your... generous donation, ~target~.
Do not worry, ~name~. According to recent surveys, most people have seen a woman masturbate online at least once. Most people here will not see anything they have not seen before.
I will be taking notes. I hope you do not mind, ~name~. It is for the sake of worldwide knowledge after all.
And there she goes...
I will pay very close attention...
Do not mind us, do what is necessary to fulfill your self-pleasure...

Some women report achieving an orgasm from nipple stimulation, but this is rare. Research suggests that the orgasms are genital orgasms, and may also be directly linked to "the genital area of the brain."
It seems that sensation from the nipples travels to the same part of the brain as sensations from the vagina, clitoris and cervix.
Nipple stimulation may trigger uterine contractions, which then produce a sensation in the genital area of the brain.
Fingering is typically the use of fingers or hands to sexually stimulate the vulva (including the clitoris) or vagina.
Vaginal fingering is legally and medically called digital penetration or digital penetration of the vagina.
Fingering may also include the use of fingers to sexually stimulate the anus.
Parts of the vulva, especially the clitoris, are erogenous zones. Massage of the vulva, and in particular the clitoris, is the most common way for a woman to achieve an orgasm.
Studies indicate that 70-80% of women require direct clitoral stimulation to achieve orgasm.
You should massage the clitoral glans or shaft, usually through the skin of the clitoral hood, using up-and-down, side-to-side, or circular motions. Trust me, I read Wikipedia.

While the vagina is not especially sensitive as a whole, its lower third (the area close to the entrance) has concentrations of the nerve endings that can provide pleasurable sensations when stimulated during sexual activity.

{small}Fingering the vagina is often performed in an effort to stimulate the G-spot. The G-spot is reportedly located roughly 5 cm (2.0 in) up on the anterior wall of the vagina, forwards toward the navel. It is described as being recognized by its ridges and slightly rougher texture compared to the more cushion-like vaginal cavity walls around it. Fingering this spot, and in effect possibly stimulating the Skene's gland, is commonly cited as a method that may lead to female ejaculation.{!reset}

{small}Anal fingering may be pleasurable because of the large number of nerve endings in the anal area, and because of the added stimulation gained from stretching the anal sphincter muscles while inserting the finger.
However, a good quality personal lubricant is advisable to both increase the pleasurable sensation and aid insertion.{!reset}
When pleasuring the anus, some people prefer to simply stimulate the outer ring, while others will follow this by inserting one or more fingers.

Fingering is generally considered safe sex as long as there are no open wounds on the fingers. The nails should be trimmed and filed; long, sharp or jagged nails can cause cuts, injury, or severe infection.
I am not an expert on other people's masturbation, but hers seem to be nearing to a close.
She seems to be near her climax. But do not take my word on it, I do not have any source for it.
Just out of curiosity, how would you describe your feelings as you approach orgasm?
I must remind you that your hands should be thoroughly washed with soap and warm water before practicing any other activity to avoid spreading bacteria or germs.
I hope that was pleasurable for you!
In a scale of 1 to 10, how much have you enjoyed pleasuring yourself in front of strangers?
That sure was a spectacle, ~name~. Would you like to be immortalized forever as the image for the article I am currently writing? I can set up a date with Commons-tan for some photo shoots.
Am I really the first one to do this? I would have prefered to see someone else do it before, but I shall comply with the rules!
I... Was not expecting to lose this early. No need to worry, I will comply with the rules! This will be educational anyway.
Well... At least I am about to do this in a consensual, safe and sexually-free environment. This could have been considered awkward anywhere else!
Oh well. It appears that it is my turn now. Let me get into position!
Time for me to experience this part of the game. I can not wait to write down my experience after I finish!
I hope you find my performance pleasing to watch. I will try to make it a good one!
I will do my best to make my performance interesting. But I apologize in advance if I get too carried away!
I must remain calm... and concentrate on my masturbation...
Various medical and... psychological benefits have been attributed to a... healthy attitude toward sexual activity in general... and to masturbation in particular...
... Masturbation... has been depicted in art since prehistoric times... a-and is both mentioned and discussed in... very early writings...
This is enjoyable...
Organized... and neatly...
I am... Sorry if I am getting too carried away... I will try to make this more pleasing to watch...
S-so many things we can learn... So much knowledge...
The article is missing some more information... On h-how good this feels...
I-I wouldn't mind being an article right now... So anyone could touch up all of me...
I must not forget... to write this down later...
... (Wiki, wiki...)
J-jeez...!
I am...! About to...!
This is... so exciting...!
Hah... Haah...
N-nya...
I can feel it coming...!
{small}... V-vandalize me...{!reset}
Hnnng...!
Huff... Phew... That was... certainly an fascinating experience!
I... I-... I want to write all of this down, before I forget about it...
... Phew... S-so this is why this place is so popular... This will definitely go into the article...
A day like this in 2001, the Netherlands became the first country to legalize same-sex marriage.
Did you know that in a day just like this one, but back in 2004, Google announced Gmail for the first time?
Back in 1979, in a day just like this, Nickelodeon launched in the United States, leaving behind it's old name of Pinwheel. Is that not interesting or what?
Do you like Apple products, ~player~? Apple Inc. was formed by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak and Ronald Wayne back in April 1st, 1976!
In a day like this, back in 1944, the United States bombed the Swiss city of Schaffhausen due to navigation errors. This is why aeronautical radio operators are important, people!

{small}In a day like this in 1982, Argentina invaded the Falklands under the orders of it's military dictatorship as an attempt to regain the population's patriotic feelings, calculating that the United Kingdom wouldn't respond. But they didn't know that Margaret Thatcher needed to regain her country's trust as well, and reclaiming the islands did just that! Isn't that interesting?{!reset}
Did you know that in a day just like this one in 1800, Ludwig van Beethoven led the premiere of his First Symphony in Vienna? Why don't you give it a listen?

{small}In a day just like this, back in 2005, the first non-italian pope since the 16th Century, John Paul II was leaving this mortal plane. He was born as Karol Józef Wojtyła from Poland, and was succeeded by the german Joseph Ratzinger, and later the argentinian Jorge Bergoglio.{!reset}
I hope you do not mind that I am using the remaining time to think about the article I will write once I get home.
Now that I think about it, I should not have forgotten my phone at home...
This was a very different experience than what I expected from the Inventory... But I liked it nonetheless!
I did not expect to win my first game ever! Thank you for this experience. It was very... Informative!
This experience was quite informative. But I am not done yet! There are more things to discover about this place, and I will write an article about it!
I get to win again! It is always so much fun to play with everyone. I hope we can do it again!
I won again! Maybe next time I will get to write about the masturbation phase, but for now, I will keep writing about winning!
This line of dialogue shouldn't play. If it does, please inform the writer through the feedback button.
It is always a pleasure to play with you again, ~player~! I hope we meet in another table soon!
Maybe I lost this time, but there is so much data I can add to my next article! Thank you so much everyone!
Such a fascinating experience! Maybe I should come back here more often? If you think I should, you should say so in the feedback button!
I guess not all games can be won. But this was still a very informative experience! Thank you everyone for your help!
This was fun! And I have learned so much from this experience. Perhaps I should come back more often? Be sure to tell me what you think of the idea by clicking the Feedback button!
This was a fascinating experience! I would like to play with all of you again!
This was so much fun! I forgot how thrilling investigation could be. I hope we can play together next time!
